summary:
I found the blood splatters very unnatural looking so I just decided to make my own.
I tried just a few hours ago and the feedback was right and it did not look real neither so I remade this again.
descriptionHtml:
I found the blood splatters very unnatural looking so I just decided to make my own.
I tried just a few hours ago and the feedback was right and it did not look real neither so I remade this again.

Hope you find this better than vanilla ones.

The included textures are 2048x2048

-------------------------
INSTALATION
-----------------------
1. Once downloaded put the rar file in your Skyrim folder
2. Extract them (the files have the internal structure to make it work)
3. Critic my textures

-------------------------
DESINSTALATION
-----------------------
1. Locate the following files:
----- they are in Data/Textures/Blood
------------- decalsbloodsplatter01.dss
------------- decalsbloodsplatter01_n.dss
------------- decalsbloodsplatterblend01.dss
------------- decalsbloodsplatterblend01_n.dss
------------- decalsbloodsplatterblendaltalpha.dss


If you want to use them in other mods or redistribute .. Use it as you wish, no asking needed.
author: Cristofano Varacolaci
